name: df-aa
body: |- wceq(caa, ciun(s0, cdif(cfv(cply, cz), csn(c0p)), cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), csn(nat0))))
comment: Define the set of algebraic numbers. An algebraic number is a root of a nonzero polynomial over the integers. Here we construct it as the union of all kernels (preimages of ` { 0 } ` ) of all polynomials in ` ( Poly `` ZZ ) ` , except the zero polynomial ` 0p ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jul-2014.)
